hero.title: One prompt. Multiple directions.
hero.description:
Stop guessing which AI model suits your vision.
Compare side by side, pick your direction, iterate until perfect.

features.title: 5 AI Models, 5 Styles
features.description: Each model has unique strengths. Find yours.

items.title: Flux Pro
items.description: Photorealistic with stunning detail. Best for product shots and portraits.

items.title: Flux Dev
items.description: Balanced quality and speed. Great for general-purpose generation.

items.title: Recraft
items.description: Design-focused with clean aesthetics. Perfect for illustrations.

items.title: Ideogram
items.description: Excellent text rendering. Ideal for logos and posters.

items.title: Gemini
items.description: Google's latest image model. Creative and versatile output.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Compare (4 models) costs 12 credits. Single model iteration costs 2-4 credits. New users get 10 free credits.

items.question: Can I download the images?
items.answer: Yes! All images are yours. No watermarks, full resolution, instant download.

items.question: What happens after I pick a direction?
items.answer: You enter iteration mode. Keep refining with the same model until perfect.
